item.title: Anthropic的五角大楼对决不仅关乎人工智能的防护措施
item.description:
美国国防部与这家市值3800亿美元的技术巨头之间的高风险冲突，直指人工智能在战争中究竟能发挥多大作用的核心问题。

【原文：

The high-stakes conflict between the Defense Department and a $380 billion tech powerhouse goes to the heart of just how far AI can go in warfare.

】

item.title: 人民币兑欧元汇率回升为默兹访德送上暖心礼物
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希·默茨率领该国众多商界领袖访华期间，看到人民币终于开始对欧元升值，他或许会感到欣慰。【原文：As German Chancellor Friedrich Merz tours China with a host of his country’s business leaders, he may be heartened to see the Chinese yuan is at last starting to appreciate against the euro.】

item.title: 华尔街称日本收益率曲线趋平已过度
item.description: 华尔街对日本债券市场的坚定押注正开始动摇，策略师们认为，在首相高市早苗选举获胜后收益率曲线急剧趋平的走势已走得太远。【原文：Wall Street’s conviction trade on Japan’s bond market is starting to fray, with strategists arguing the sharp flattening in the yield curve after Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s election victory has gone too far.】

item.title: 韩国央行维持基准利率不变，同时上调2026年经济增长预期
item.description: 韩国央行维持基准利率不变，同时小幅上调了今年经济增长和通胀预期，为政策制定者提供了更多时间来权衡下一步行动。【原文：South Korea’s central bank kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged and slightly upgraded its forecasts for both economic growth and inflation this year, giving policymakers more time to weigh their next move.】

item.title: 韩国银行将发布六个月利率指引以加强沟通
item.description: 韩国银行将于周四开始公布政策委员会对六个月后基准利率的中位数预测，此举标志着该行将逐步放弃当前提供三个月量化利率指引的制度。【原文：The Bank of Korea will start releasing the policy board’s median projection of where the base rate will be six months hence on Thursday, moving away from its current system of providing three-month quantitative rate guidance.】

item.title: 长滩港进口量在贸易战动荡中下滑13%
item.description: 经由加州长滩港的进口量在1月份同比下降13%，去年此时货运公司正争相运输货物，以应对特朗普总统即将实施的关税政策。【原文：Imports through California’s Port of Long Beach dropped 13% in January from last year, when shippers were rushing to move freight in anticipation of President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 芝加哥遭惠誉下调信用评级 财政困境加剧
item.description: 惠誉评级因芝加哥市财政赤字及市长布兰登·约翰逊与市议会之间的摩擦，将该市信用评级下调一级，凸显了这座全美第三大城市面临日益严峻的财政挑战。【原文：Fitch Ratings lowered Chicago’s credit grade one notch due to the city’s deficits and the friction between Mayor Brandon Johnson and the city council, underscoring the mounting financial challenges facing the third-largest US city.】

item.title: 朝鲜领导人金正恩誓言继续发展核武，但向美国敞开大门
item.description: 金正恩承诺将建造更多核武器并升级导弹计划，但表示若华盛顿承认朝鲜为核大国，两国关系也有可能改善。【原文：Kim Jong Un pledged to build more nuclear weapons and upgrade his missile programs but said it could also be possible to improve relations with the US if Washington recognizes North Korea as a nuclear power.】

item.title: 富国银行KKR私募信贷基金因不良贷款上升削减分红
item.description: 由Future Standard与KKR & Co.共同管理的私募信贷基金，因利率下行及问题投资导致亏损，盈利下滑，故将股息从每股70美分削减至48美分。【原文：A private credit fund jointly managed by Future Standard and KKR & Co. cut its dividend to 48 cents a share from 70 cents after earnings fell amid declining interest rates and losses tied to struggling investments.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索债券因流动性充沛及政策倾向鸽派而成为亚洲新兴市场最佳选择
item.description: 菲律宾比索债券有望在降息、充裕的国内流动性和诱人估值的推动下延续涨势。【原文：Philippine peso bonds are poised to extend their rally on interest-rate cuts, flush domestic liquidity and attractive valuations.】

item.title: 百度110亿美元闪电抛售凸显其难以兑现人工智能炒作承诺
item.description: 百度公司股价在过去一个月下跌20%，这为参与中国日益激烈的AI竞赛的企业敲响了警钟：投资者要求看到切实成果。【原文：A 20% slide in Baidu Inc.’s shares over the past month serves as a crucial reminder for companies in China’s rapidly intensifying artificial intelligence race: investors are demanding tangible results.】

item.title: 油价小幅走高，美伊核谈判前夕
item.description: 在美伊核谈判前夕，油价小幅走高。部分中东主要产油国正增加出口，因该地区潜在冲突引发的担忧导致未来供应前景不明朗。【原文：Oil edged higher before nuclear talks between the US and Iran, with some major Middle Eastern producers boosting exports as concerns about a potential conflict in the region create uncertainty about future supply.】

item.title: 金价维持近期涨幅，交易员关注美国关税政策及伊朗谈判进展
item.description: 金价持稳，交易员权衡中东地缘政治紧张局势以及美国关税对全球贸易的影响。【原文：Gold steadied, as traders weighed geopolitical tensions in the Middle East and the impact of US tariffs on global trade.】

item.title: Core Lithium向嘉能可出售库存，计划重启芬尼斯项目
item.description: 科瑞锂业公司已将其位于澳大利亚闲置的芬尼斯矿的库存矿石出售给嘉能可公司，此举旨在筹集资金以支持该项目的潜在重启。【原文：Core Lithium Ltd. has sold a stockpile of ore from its idled Finniss mine in Australia to Glencore Plc., raising cash to support a potential restart of the project.】

item.title: 鲍曼称银行需要“灵活性”以应对非银行机构的竞争
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔·鲍曼表示，尽管银行体系依然稳健，但必须为传统贷款机构提供工具和灵活性，使其能够"有效竞争"。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman said that while the banking system remains strong, it is important that traditional lenders be given tools and flexibility to “compete effectively.”】

item.title: 马来西亚押注榴莲之旅与野生动物资源，延续旅游业繁荣
item.description: 通往布鲁皮榴莲园的车程并非普通车辆所能驾驭。这条狭窄崎岖的小径蜿蜒穿过马来西亚中部偏远的山丘，载着游客穿越黏腻的热浪与茂密的树林。【原文：The drive up to Bloopy Durians’ orchard isn’t for ordinary cars. The narrow, rutted track snakes across the remote hills of central Malaysia, taking visitors through sticky heat and dense trees.】

item.title: 稀土矿商莱纳斯业绩激增，但未达预期
item.description: 莱纳斯稀土公司报告称，截至去年12月底的六个月内，其利润大幅增长，这得益于产量提升及其主要产品价格上涨，但仍低于分析师预期——此前全球对金属供应链的关注已推高了市场预期。【原文：Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. reported a surge in profit for the six months to the end of December, on the back of stronger production and improved prices for its main product, but fell short of analyst expectations heightened by the global focus on metal supply chains.】

item.title: 动量中游公司正寻求出售，交易可能价值50亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，EnCap Flatrock Midstream正考虑以超过50亿美元的价格出售天然气管道公司Momentum Midstream。【原文：EnCap Flatrock Midstream is considering a sale of gas pipeline company Momentum Midstream for over $5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望攀升，英伟达提振市场情绪：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周四有望上涨，受华尔街转为看涨情绪提振。英伟达公司发布乐观展望后，美股在收盘后延续涨势。【原文：Asian equities looked set to advance Thursday, buoyed by a bullish turn on Wall Street which gained momentum after the closing bell from an upbeat outlook by Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 澳大利亚科技企业盈利或缓解对人工智能颠覆的担忧
item.description: 在全球对人工智能颠覆性影响的忧虑中，澳大利亚常被忽视的技术行业或许展现出韧性迹象——近期一系列财报显示该行业正稳步增长。【原文：Australia’s often overlooked technology sector may offer signs of resilience amid the global unease over artificial intelligence disruption, with a run of earnings reports showing steady gains.】

item.title: 优选公司称柯克兰退出证明华尔街存在"卡特尔"
item.description: 优选通信公司表示，一家顶级律所因受到阿波罗全球管理公司、阿瑞斯管理公司、橡树资本管理公司等机构的压力而退出其代理业务，这表明这些机构正在参与针对该公司的卡特尔行为。【原文：Optimum Communications Inc. said a top law firm’s withdrawal from representing it under pressure from Apollo Global Management, Ares Management, Oaktree Capital Management and others showed that they were participating in a cartel against it.】

item.title: C3.ai在首席执行官交接后将裁员26%
item.description: 数据分析软件制造商C3.ai公司任命新任首席执行官后，正裁减约四分之一员工。【原文：C3.ai Inc., a maker of data analysis software, is cutting about a quarter of its workforce after the appointment of a new chief executive officer.】

item.title: Zoom下调盈利预期，全力拓展产品组合
item.description: Zoom通信公司发布的盈利预期低于分析师预期，这表明在积极推广其扩展产品套件的同时，该公司面临着更高的成本压力。【原文：Zoom Communications Inc. gave a profit outlook that fell short of analysts’ estimates, suggesting higher costs for the company while it aggressively pitches its expanded suite of products.】

item.title: 蓝星钢铁称修订后的收购要约不足，但愿意接受交易
item.description: 澳大利亚蓝星钢铁有限公司表示，钢铁动力公司和SGH有限公司提出的修订后收购要约低估了该公司价值，但仍对更优报价持开放态度。【原文：Australia’s BlueScope Steel Ltd. said a revised bid from Steel Dynamics Inc. and SGH Ltd. undervalues the company, but remains open to a better offer.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称关税不确定性风险恐阻碍美国经济"强劲增长"
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，围绕美国全面加征关税的动荡局势，可能削弱原本"强劲"的经济增长势头。【原文：Turmoil around sweeping US tariffs risks undercutting what’s otherwise a “buoyant” economy, the International Monetary Fund said.】

item.title: 开发者为节省成本，AI错误激怒玩家
item.description:
游戏与人工智能，看似天作之合，却开局艰难。【原文：

Games and AI, seemingly a perfect match, are off to a rocky start

】

item.title: Snowflake营收展望未能打动投资者
item.description: 雪花公司公布的季度销售预期符合市场预期，令投资者感到失望。这些投资者原本期待更强劲的表现，以消除对人工智能时代软件行业生存能力的担忧。【原文：Snowflake Inc. gave an outlook for quarterly sales that was in line with estimates, disappointing investors who were looking for a stronger showing to overcome jitters about the software industry’s viability in the age of AI.】

item.title: 交易员押注1400万美元：华纳竞购失败反而会成为奈飞的胜利
item.description: 一位期权交易员似乎押注近1400万美元，认为若奈飞公司收购华纳兄弟探索公司的计划失败，该公司反而会获益。【原文：An options trader appears to be betting almost $14 million that Netflix Inc. will win should it lose out on its bid to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.】

item.title: 英伟达乐观的销售预测表明人工智能热潮依然强劲
item.description: 全球市值最高的企业英伟达公司再次给出乐观的季度营收预测，表明大规模的人工智能计算建设仍在按计划推进。【原文：Nvidia Corp., the world’s most valuable company, gave another bullish quarterly revenue forecast, signaling that the massive build-out of AI computing remains on track.】

item.title: Nubank的人工智能模型助力净利息收入增长
item.description: Nu Holdings Ltd.的信贷利润率在第四季度有所提升，这家拉丁美洲最大的金融科技公司扩大了人工智能驱动的信贷模型的应用范围。【原文：Nu Holdings Ltd.’s credit margins increased in the fourth quarter, as Latin America’s largest fintech expanded its use of a credit model powered by artificial intelligence.】
